messages.text:
Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

On Wed, Jan 30, 2013 at 5:23 PM, Rob Pike <r@golang.org> wrote:

> documentation?

Turns out we never explicitly documented that repeated fields *didn't*
have getters, so the docs in lib.go are still true:

          - There are getters that return a field's value if set,
                and return the field's default value if unset.
                The getters work even if the receiver is a nil message.

I can adjust the wording if you think it's needed.

documentation?

-rob
On Jan 30, 2013 7:07 AM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> https://codereview.appspot.**com/7225068/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7225068/>
>

goprotobuf: Repeated field getters.

subject: code review 7225068: goprotobuf: Repeated field getters.
